QuestData.Title: Stormcaller's Footguards
QuestData.Description: Qiraji magic is strong and ancient. The most powerful qiraji wield items of such might, they'd give pause even to a dragon.$B$BBring me the qiraji bindings of dominance and other minor components and I'll create a set of powerful boots for you.$B$BYou will find them useful in the fight against the enemy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Qiraji Bindings of Dominance, 2 Idols of the Sage, 5 Bronze Scarabs and 5 Clay Scarabs to Kandrostrasz in Ahn'Qiraj. This quest also requires Neutral faction with the Brood of Nozdormu.
QuestData.CompletionText: You've acquired the items I requested, $n?
